parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Maximum number of external locations to return. If not set, all the external locations are returned (not recommended).

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Opaque pagination token to go to next page based on previous query.

parameters.name: include_browse
parameters.description: Whether to include external locations in the response for which the principal can only access selective metadata for

200.description: The external location list was successfully retrieved.
